group_1.textRight: Today was a total bust too...@We found nothing but Familiars.

group_1.textLeft: Let's check the next place, Hanna.
We have to defeat the Witch.
Magical Girls exist to defeat Witches!

group_1.narration: [textBlack:To Sena]
[textBlack:Lately you've been really crazy about]@[textBlack:hunting Witches.]@[textBlack:Did something happen?]
[textBlack:Like, did you meet another Magical Girl]@[textBlack:and they said something to you,]@[textBlack:or something...?]
[textBlack:No, I didn't meet anybody.]
[textBlack:It's just...]@[textBlack:Well, Witches make everybody]@[textBlack:suffer, right?]
[textBlack:As a Magical Girl,]@[textBlack:I want to do something about it,]@[textBlack:that's all.]
[textBlack:That's our job, right?]
[textBlack:Yeah...]@[textBlack:I guess that's fine.]
Of course, I wasn't really@having such wonderful thoughts.
I was desperately fighting for myself...@No, I was panicking.

group_1.textLeft: I think that takes care of it.

group_1.narration: That Magical Girl...@Kanagi gave me the feeling that she was@far more experienced at fighting than us.
I played along, saying I was so happy@to meet another Magical Girl.@All the while, I was investigating her.
And my conclusion was...@That I could never be friends with her.
While we were hunting for Witches,@I talked to her about all sorts of things,@trying to learn more about her...@And I noticed something.
Whenever I tried to pry information out of her,@she would stop me before I could even@get the words out.
It wasn't a coincidence.
Time and time again,@she would be one step ahead of me,@evading the questions I wanted to ask.
...I had a hunch that it was magic.
I could use suggestions to make@people obey me...@Hanna could copy other people's magic@and make it her own...
In the same way, she could have anything.@Surely there's some magic out there@that lets you read minds.
She might have realized@just how much I've been lying.
If that's true, then I'm in danger.
She might end up telling Hanna.
So I decided to erase Kanagi's memories.
I didn't want her to have anything@to do with me anymore,@so I'll get rid of all her memories of me.
It'll be fine,@I'm sure that my suggestions can do it...
Thinking that, I chased after Kanagi@only to find Hanna already there.
Kanagi tilted her head with a confused look,@but soon she left as though nothing had happened.
It was as though everything that happened@had simply disappeared from her mind.
Hanna's magic is overwriting...@With it, she can copy somebody else's magic.
But she took a liking to my suggestion magic@and used it all the time.
Yes...@Hanna could use the same magic as me.
In other words...
Hanna used suggestion magic@to get rid of Kanagi's memories of us,@just like I was about to do.
It's as if she had never met us,@at least from her perspective.
Maybe Hanna saw how wary I was,@and decided to take care of it like this.
Hanna is such a nice person.
She could've taken the opportunity to get@rid of a rival by also wiping her mind completely@clean of anything related to Grief Seeds,@but she didn't.
...She really is nice.
Yeah... It's fine.
All I have to do is get my hands on lots@and lots of Grief Seeds in her stead,@since she's so kind.
My Soul Gem was incredibly tainted.
I was using magic practically all day,@so it got used up really quickly.
I knew I had to get more.
That's how I became increasingly@focused on hunting Witches.
If I was going to be useful to Hanna,@I figured I should really impress her.@I fought so, so many battles.
I wanted to stay with her...@That was the only thing on my mind.
